hero.title: <highlight>Finding</highlight> yourself after baby, one step at a time
hero.description: Wellmum is more than just a program: it's a wellness app designed for mums. With tailored routines, a caring AI coach, and a supportive community, you'll make progress every day ‚Äî at your own pace ‚Äî to regain your strength, balance, and confidence.

feature1.description: Personalized programs tailored to your pace and your body.

feature2.description: A caring AI coach, available 24/7 to support you every day.

feature3.description: Each exercise is approved by postpartum specialists.

why.title: Designed for mums,
why.subtitle: Wellmum supports you after childbirth with tailored routines, kind guidance, and professional-approved advice. To help you regain your energy, your balance, and the best version of yourself.

feature1.title: A personalized recovery program
feature1.description: Each plan is designed and tailored to your type of delivery, your pace, and your needs.

feature2.title: A caring AI coach, always there for you
feature2.description: A coach who listens and supports you at your own pace and every step of your recovery.

feature3.title: Smart and motivating progress tracking
feature3.description: Visualize your progress through indicators designed especially for mums, without pressure.

feature4.title: 100% safe exercises
feature4.description: Validated by postpartum rehabilitation specialists, to support you with confidence.

feature5.title: A safe and supportive community
feature5.description: Join other mums going through the same thing, in a caring space where you can share, support each other, and never feel alone.

feature6.title: Accessible, wherever you are
feature6.description: At home, in the park, or during baby's nap ‚Äî your routines adapt to your daily life.

nutrition.title: What does Wellmum include?
nutrition.subtitle: Discover all the features designed to support you with care and efficiency throughout your postpartum journey.

feature1.title: Track your <highlight>nutrition</highlight> effortlessly
feature1.description: Take a photo of your meal and Wellmum automatically tells you the calories and the breakdown of protein, carbs, and fat.

feature2.title: <highlight>Together</highlight>, we go further
feature2.description: Connect with other mums, share experiences, find support, and move forward together. Because rebuilding yourself is easier when you're not alone.

feature3.title: Track your <highlight>progress</highlight>, move at your own pace
feature3.description: Track your weight, measurements, and nutrition goals‚Äîand receive personalized recommendations.

feature4.title: <highlight>Move, hydrate</highlight>, take care of yourself
feature4.description: Easily track your daily water intake and activity. Wellmum helps you stay hydrated and active, without pressure.

testimonials.badge: Your success story could be next!
testimonials.title: Real Stories from Real Moms
testimonials.description1: WellMum began with a mission ‚Äî to support women in one of the most transformative times of their lives. What started as a small idea from Sarah and Manuela became a global platform for mothers' recovery and confidence
testimonials.description2: See how other mothers have transformed their lives through our programmes

testimonial1.quote: Sarah's programme gave me my confidence back. I'm stronger now than I was before having kids, and I feel amazing!
testimonial1.author: Jessica M.

testimonial2.quote: I never thought I could feel this strong and energetic with three kids. Sarah's support made all the difference.
testimonial2.author: Amanda K.

testimonial3.quote: The postpartum recovery programme was exactly what I needed. Sarah understood my concerns and helped me heal properly.
testimonial3.author: Maria L.

testimonial4.quote: As a busy mom, I struggled to find time for myself. Sarah's programme was flexible and effective, and I finally feel like me again.
testimonial4.author: Emily R.

consultation.title: Download the app
consultation.description: Download the WellMum app and start your postpartum recovery journey today.

footer.description: Empowering mothers to reclaim their strength and confidence through safe, effective postpartum fitness programmes.

blogPost.defaultDescription: Discover our tips for your postpartum recovery and wellbeing.

ourStory.metaDescription: Learn about the WellMum story - how we're empowering mothers through postpartum recovery with expert-validated programs, AI support, and a caring community.

hero.title: Our Story
hero.paragraph1: WellMum was born from a simple truth ‚Äî mothers deserve care, too
hero.paragraph2: After witnessing how many women struggle to recover physically and emotionally after childbirth, our founders decided to create a space where recovery feels personal, gentle, and guided

card1.title: Our Mission
card1.description: We combine medical expertise, artificial intelligence, and compassion to help mothers restore balance, confidence, and strength at their own pace

card2.title: How We Help
card2.description: Expert-validated programs, emotional support, and intelligent progress tracking ‚Äî so every mother can feel safe, understood, and empowered on her journey

card3.title: The Heart of WellMum
card3.description: What started as a small initiative between two women passionate about postpartum wellness has now become a growing community of mothers around the world

founders.title: Founders' Message
founders.quote: As mothers and wellness professionals, we've seen how recovery often takes a back seat. WellMum was created to change that ‚Äî to give women the care, confidence, and community they deserve
